test_scenarios.name: 00-authenticate_super_tenant_users
test_scenarios.description: Select random super tenant users and authenticate through the RemoteUserStoreManagerService.

test_scenarios.name: 01-oauth_auth_code_redirect_with_consent
test_scenarios.display_name: Auth Code Grant Redirect With Consent
test_scenarios.description: Obtain an access token using the OAuth 2.0 authorization code grant type.

test_scenarios.name: 10-scim2_get_user_by_scim_id
test_scenarios.description: Get user details by passing the SCIM ID.

test_scenarios.name: 11-scim2_update_user_by_scim_id
test_scenarios.description: Update user details by passing the SCIM ID.

test_scenarios.name: 12-scim2_add_user
test_scenarios.description: Add user to the system with SCIM APIs.

test_scenarios.name: 02-oauth_implicit_redirect_with_consent
test_scenarios.description: Obtain an access token using the OAuth 2.0 implicit grant type.

test_scenarios.name: 03-oauth_password_grant
test_scenarios.description: Obtain an access token using the OAuth 2.0 password grant type.

test_scenarios.name: 04-oauth_client_credential_grant
test_scenarios.description: Obtain an access token using the OAuth 2.0 client credential grant type.

test_scenarios.name: 05-oidc_auth_code_redirect_with_consent
test_scenarios.display_name: OIDC Auth Code Grant Redirect With Consent
test_scenarios.description: Obtain an access token and an id token using the OAuth 2.0 authorization code grant type.

test_scenarios.name: 06-oidc_implicit_redirect_with_consent
test_scenarios.display_name: OIDC Implicit Grant Redirect With Consent
test_scenarios.description: Obtain an access token and an id token using the OAuth 2.0 implicit grant type.

test_scenarios.name: 07-oidc_password_grant
test_scenarios.description: Obtain an access token and an id token using the OAuth 2.0 password grant type.

test_scenarios.name: 08-oidc_request_path_authenticator
test_scenarios.display_name: OIDC Auth Code Request Path Authenticator With Consent
test_scenarios.description: Obtain an access token and an id token using the request path authenticator.

test_scenarios.name: 09-saml2_sso_redirect_binding
test_scenarios.description: Obtain a SAML 2 assertion response using redirect binding.
